name: Beloved's The Henry
description: This variation on the classic Manhattan from Beloved in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, brings together rhum agricole, bourbon, vermouth and bitters.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces aged rhum agricole, such as Clement
1 ounce sweet vermouth, such as Cocchi Vermouth di Torino
Garnish: wide strip of orange peel

recipeInstructions.text: Fill stirring glass generously with ice. Add rhum agricole, bourbon, vermouth, Angostura and orange bitters to glass. Stir gently until well chilled, about 1 minute. Pour through julep strainer into glass and garnish with orange twist.
